title: Can't Re-install LoL

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please download the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) for me, launch it as Administrator and run with the default settings.

A file should be saved to your desktop called LoL-Logs.zip, please upload this somewhere and post the link in a reply here.
